test_cases.title: View Waiting Deviation status in search dropdown menu
description: The Prism CM Adapter Delivery Team navigates to the Change Objects landing page.
The user selects to search by the Status field.
The system retrieves and displays a list of available statuses, including 'Waiting Deviation'.

test_cases.title: Verify Waiting Deviation status display when selected
description: The Prism CM Adapter Delivery Team navigates to the Change Objects landing page.
The user selects 'Waiting Deviation' from the Status field.
The system displays the Waiting Deviation status details.
